summary: Senior Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience building production web applications at scale. Deep expertise in Vue.js, TypeScript, Ruby on Rails, and PHP/Laravel, with hands-on experience in Elasticsearch and GCP. Proven track record of leading frontend initiatives, shipping production webRTC applications, and championing Vue adoption across organizations. Known as a calm, professional, and solution-oriented developer who thrives in agile, remote-first environments.
